meanings.definition: A permanent mark or design made on the skin by a process of pricking and ingraining an indelible pigment.
meanings.sent1: She got a tattoo of a butterfly on her arm.
meanings.sent2: His tattoo of a heart symbolizes love and commitment.
meanings.sent3: The tattoo of a smiley face on his cheek always makes people smile.
meanings.sent4: Her tattoo of a compass guides her through life's journey.
meanings.sent5: The tattoo of a star on her wrist shines brightly in the night.

meanings.definition: A military signal sounded by bugle at night, indicating the time to go to bed.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers heard the tattoo and knew it was time to rest.
meanings.sent2: At the sound of the tattoo, the camp settled into silence.
meanings.sent3: The tattoo played softly, lulling the troops to sleep.
meanings.sent4: Under the night sky, the tattoo echoed across the base.
meanings.sent5: The tattoo signaled the end of the day's duties for the weary soldiers.

meanings.definition: A rhythmic tapping or drumming sound.
meanings.sent1: The tattoo of rain on the roof was soothing to her ears.
meanings.sent2: The tattoo of footsteps approached slowly in the dark.
meanings.sent3: The tattoo of pencils on the desk created a rhythmic beat.
meanings.sent4: The tattoo of the drummer's sticks filled the concert hall.
meanings.sent5: The tattoo of the woodpecker echoed through the forest.
